Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{3: 'Recently, Ayla has finally stopped making noise, allowing you to catch up on some much-needed rest.'}
{3: "Huh? There's a message on my terminal..."}
{3: 'Babylonia will be displaying a new installation titled "Traces" by the city\'s revolutionary artist, Ayla, for a limited time!'}
{3: 'The past few days flash before your eyes...'}
{3: 'Residential area—'}
{3: 'You see a pure white container with the door open.'}
{3: "Well, let's go have a look before the crowd shows up."}
{3: 'And with that, you walk into the container.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Walking into the pitch-black interior, you cannot even see your feet.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, the door closes quietly.'}
{3: 'A mechanical buzzing increases in volume as a scanner flashes in your eyes.'}
{3: 'After the residual white light on the retina dissipates, the scene in front of you is...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{3: 'A familiar desert with a familiar figure... It is Roseblade.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roseblade', 3: 'Get a load of this!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Roseblade's sword thrusts at you!"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{3: 'You dodge to the side instinctively, but Instinct directed the body to flash aside, but it disappears as the laser scans you again.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory13.jpg'}
{3: 'After another flash of white light...'}
{3: 'Your arduous fight with Nozzle appears before you.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory85.png'}
{3: "Rosetta and Alpha's blades clash in front of your eyes."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}

{2: "Ayla's Voice", 3: 'This is a "scene reproduction" hologram made by optical refraction technology. It aims to use the magic of light and wavelengths to deliver an immersive experience that VR can\'t achieve in such a limited space.'}
{2: "Ayla's Voice", 3: 'I would like to sincerely thank the Gray Raven Commandant for giving me inspiration and solving my "puzzle" during its creation.'}
{3: 'In the space before you, a line of text is typed out: Special thanks to 【kuroname】.'}
{3: 'Meanwhile...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory116.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Agent', 3: "Is this what you're going to use for the next art exhibition?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Yup! That's the one.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Agent', 3: "...I didn't expect you to change your creative style with such a sharp turn.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent', 3: 'I feel like this is a more complete vision compared to just using ordinary objects like you did before.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Agent', 3: "You don't think so?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'It may have something to do with my new source of inspiration?', 4: '1'}
